title: There should be an Anti-burst Keystone in Resolve tree
body:
Anyone else think with all these assassins in every lane there should be an Anti-burst keystone in Resolve? Something like steraks passive when you take a lot of damage at once would be nice. I know we have null orb but I feel like there are a lot of champs who would like to take resolve but there is no good keystone for them, like {{champion:82}}(solo lane) for example.
{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

replies.body: Everyone is already taking Bone plating, no. Assassins are supposed to assassinate (and I know they just dal way too much damage), stop adding "counterplay to counterplay to counterplay to counterplay" for fuck sake and just solve the source of the issue aka {{item:3147}}
It's sorcery: Nullifying Orb (yes it is a poor excuse for an anti-burst option against AD assassins, but it exiats)
